mapper.select: SELECT pn FROM parsing_url WHERE url = #{url}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_url` AS pu ON pv.`url_pn` = pu.`pn` WHERE pv.`user_pn` = 1

SELECT pv.pn, pu.url, pv.user_pn, pv.register_date, pd.`title` FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_url` AS pu ON pv.`url_pn` = pu.`pn` LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_data` AS pd ON pd.`visit_pn` = pv.`pn` WHERE pv.`user_pn` = 1 ORDER BY pv.pn DESC LIMIT #{pagination.itemSeqBegin}, #{pagination.numItemsPerPage}
SELECT html FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_data` AS pt ON pv.`pn` = pt.`visit_pn` WHERE pv.`pn` = #{value} AND pv.`user_pn` = 1
SELECT pi.`visit_pn`, pi.`url`, pi.`width`, pi.`height`, pi.`color` FROM `parsing_image` AS `pi` WHERE `visit_pn` = #{value}
SELECT pu.url FROM `parsing_visit` pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_url` pu ON pv.`url_pn` = pu.`pn` WHERE pv.pn = #{value} GROUP BY pu.`pn`
